summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MiroBridge with 3 NEW features: Miro OAuth integration, Professional slide template (dark blue header), and Export History (localStorage). All features working perfectly with 100% backend success and full frontend functionality.
passed_tests: GET /api/miro/status - Returns OAuth connection status (configured: true, connected: false)
GET /api/miro/auth - Proper OAuth redirect to Miro authorization
GET /api/templates - Professional template with dark blue header (#1E3A5F)
GET /api/board - Mock board data (4 frames, 17 sticky notes)
GET /api/board/mapped - Notes mapped to frames correctly
POST /api/summarize - AI summarization with Claude Sonnet 4.5
POST /api/summarize-all - Bulk AI processing for all 4 frames
Frontend: Connect Miro button visible when not connected
Frontend: Export History tab with localStorage functionality
Frontend: Professional template applied to slide previews (dark blue header)
Frontend: AI slide generation creates 4 professional slides
Frontend: PPTX export saves record to localStorage with Professional template
Frontend: Clear history button removes all export records
Frontend: Board view, slide preview, and export history tabs all functional
Frontend: Slide navigation and speaker notes toggle working
